title: Queensryche - Live Evolution (resequened by }{eywood)
description:
Queensryche
Live Evolution
Resequenced by }{eywood

Live Evolution was recorded at two shows at The Moore Theater in Seattle, July 27th and 28th 2001.  The first night was dedicated to music from the EP through Empire.  The second had a lot of the same material, but removed some songs and added material from the Hear in the Now Frontier and Q2K albums.

When the record was sequenced it was made into suites for each album.  This is not really how the set was ordered.  I have, therefore, reordered the album back to how it was played on those nights.  The sequencing of this is based on the setlist for the 27th up to the end of the Mindcrime stuff and the 28th for the rest.

01 MN 156
02 Walk in the Shadows
03 Roads to Madness
04 The Lady Wore Black
05 London
06 Screaming in Digital
07 I Am I
08 Damaged
09 Empire
10 Silent Luciity
11 Another Rainy Night (Without You)
12 Jet City Woman
13 I Remember Now
14 Revolution Calling
15 Spreading the Disease part 1
16 Electric Requiem
17 Spreading the Disease part 2
18 The Mission
19 Suite Sister Mary
20 I Don't Believe in Love
21 My Empty Room
22 Eyes of a Stranger
23 Liquid Sky
24 Sacred Ground
25 Falling Down
26 Hit the Black
27 Breakdown
28 The Right Side of My Mind
29 Take Hold of the Flame
30 Queen of the Reich
